channel.description: Adding Storage for Practice Lab: Add Required Storage to server2 start VirtualBox and add 4x250MB and 1x5GB disks to server2 1. Start VirtualBox on your Windows/Mac computer and highlight the RHEL9-VM2 virtual machine that you created in Lab 1-1. See Figure 13-1. 2. Click Settings at the top and then Storage on the window that pops up. Click on “Controller: SATA” to select it. Figure 13-2.
